base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Three drawers stacked vertically with handles, rectangular shape, uniform size, positioned at the front of the cabinet.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the cabinet on rails, allowing access to the storage space within each drawer. Each drawer is equipped with a handle for easy opening and closing, and they align neatly within the cabinet frame when closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk, providing storage for various items. Users interact by pulling the handles to open drawers, accessing contents inside. It can be moved or positioned as needed in a room.
